title: Feet first
creator_credit: Harold Lloyd Corporation and Clyde Bruckman
brief_description: In Harold Lloyd’s second ‘talkie’ he plays a hopelessly inept shoe clerk, determined to improve himself. Masquerading as a millionare he stows away on a cruise ship but gets dumped overboard in a mail sack. A highlight of the film is a high risk scene on the building scaffolding of a skyscraper where our hapless hero unexpectedly finds himself. Cast includes Harold Lloyd, Barbara Kent, Robert McWade and Lillian Leighton.
